name: North Pole Post
description:
In case you don't want to read the main menu (or missed something before pressing "Play Game"):

Story:

Tiny Twinklepants, one of Santa's elves, was a bit mischievous in November. Now December has come around and instead of getting to make toys like the other elves, Santa is making him sort the letters! No one likes sorting the letters, but if Tiny can sort enough letters correctly before Christmas, he can go back to making toys next year. Enter Tiny Twinklepants' newest invention: The Naughty and Nice Checker 3000!

Controls:

Use WASD to move

Use E to drop items

Touch falling items to pick them up - but only one at a time! (Tiny Twinklepants has tiny hands)

Press SPACE to add and remove items from the stations around the room (They can only hold one thing at a time!)

The aim of the game is to get as many points as possible!

You get points every time you put an object in the right place. 

Steps:

1. Pick up an incoming letter

2. Use the NNC 3000 to see whether the letter you're holding is on the naughty or nice list

3. Put naughty letters in the furnace to turn to ash, and put nice letters on Santa's desk to get points!

4. Wait for Santa or the Furnace, then put ash in the rubbish bin and give reply letters to the postman for more points!

5. Don't let anything fall out of the screen, and don't mix up the naughty and nice letters or you get points removed!

Known bugs: 

You can't drop the ash item without immediately picking it up again - will fix when there are more things to fix at the same time

My high-score is now 19, not 15 - comment your score below for others to try to beat!

Leave a comment or contact me for anything that doesn't seem to work
